name: mudb-root-repo
description: Root directory for project. Contains scripts to run

scripts.watch: npm run watch-stream & npm run watch-schema & npm run watch-db & npm run watch-local-socket & npm run watch-web-socket
scripts.link-all: npm run link-stream && npm run link-schema && npm run link-db & npm run link-local-socket & npm run link-web-socket
scripts.docs: mdtoc < README-toc.md > README.md && mdtoc < mudb/README-toc.md > mudb/README.md && mdtoc < munet/README-toc.md > munet/README.md && mdtoc < muschema/README-toc.md > muschema/README.md && mdtoc < mustream/README-toc.md > mustream/README.md

author: Mikola Lysenko
